backgroundInformationList.description: City's Residential Retrofit Program - City Council Meeting of April 6 and 7, 2022

noticeDescription:
Individual Bills for each of the benefitting properties listed below have been submitted for the meeting of City Council being held on April 6 and 7, 2022. Review Bill details (http://app.toronto.ca/tmmis/viewBillBylaw.do?meeting=2022.CC42).

Each of these bills imposes a special charge on each of the corresponding benefitting properties as a result of the property having entered into a Property Owner Agreement with the City and having undertaken energy efficiency and/or water conservation works as local improvements under the Residential Retrofit Program authorized by Executive Committee Item EX33.22, as adopted by Council on July 16, 17, 18 and 19, 2013 and enacted in By-law 1105-2013 (July 19, 2013).

The benefitting properties are:

  • 1 Silas Hill Drive
  • 12 Flagstaff Road
  • 30 Sunset Trail
  • 233 Gowan Avenue
  • 3285 Lawrence Avenue East

otherReferenceList.description: EX33.22 - Proposed Energy and Water Efficiency Initiative for the Residential Sector

subheading: Notice of the imposition of special charges on benefitting properties under the City's Residential Retrofit Program.
title: City's Residential Retrofit Program
topics: Financial > Special charges for City's Residential Retrofit Program
